entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • exception of type 'javax.crypto.aeadbadtag exception' was thrown when calling SecureStorage.Default.SetAsync on Android #22239
  • SkiaImage.Resize returns unsafe IImage instance #22236
  • MAUI.iOS /usr/bin/codesign exited with code 2: invalid option #22235
  • Navigation title for split flyout detail page overrides the flyout title #22233
  • FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory returns an invalid path when built for Windows as unpackaged #22231
  • Crash App when change ControlTemplate and click item in Android App MAUI #22229
  • Certain VPNs cause MAUI to respond with connectivity of NetworkAccess.Local #22228
  • Using WebSockets Exception thrown: 'System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException' in System.Private.CoreLib.dll #22221
  • Allow custom font to be read and set during runtime #22220
    Backlog
  • FontImageSource character does not display properly on specific fonts #22217
  • [MAUI] After refreshing, C2 and C3 pages will leave part of the content empty. #22215

Closed

  • [Spec] Deconstruct DualScreen Nuget into Essentials and Maui.Core (Investigating) #1164
    Backlog
  • Upgrade WindowsAppSDK dependency version #14107
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] Microsoft.Maui.Storage.FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory + CacheDataDirectory Broken - Windows 10 #18880
    Backlog
  • MAUI and OpenXR #22223
  • Not able select Listview items some times in MAUI for Windows #19422
  • Unable to build chain to self-signed root for signer .NET MAUI 7.0 #18693
  • [MAUI]Text appears overlapping on RefreshView page. #15993
  • [TotalAV] Debug build works for android maui8 but release doesnt compile because file is being used by another process #21836
  • Calling UseMauiMaps() in the MAUI startup pipeline in a multi-platform targeted App throws an exception #22214

PullRequests

Created

  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Windows] Avoid Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22218
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview4] Update versions for release of 9.0.0 p4 #22227
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22219
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22226
  • Revert "[net8.0] Merge main to net8.0" #22225

Updated

  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • Fixed On Platform="Default" not working #22148
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
